front.title: Workshop on incorporating climate change data in U.S. building codes and standards

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: NIST hosted a workshop to advance the availability of climate information sought by organizations developing standards, model building codes, and voluntary certifications by convening interactions between the building codes and climate science communities.
